metadata.title: Contact Us | Glow - We're Here to Help Your Brand Glow
metadata.description: Get in touch with the Glow team. Whether you're a ceramicist, jeweler, or digital creator, we speak your language.

hero.title: We're Here to Help Your Brand Glow
hero.subtitle: Reach out and let's create something beautiful together.

general.title: General Inquiry
general.description: Questions about our aesthetic or features? We'd love to hear from you.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Need help with your Shopify integration? Our team is here to assist.

partnerships.title: Collaborations
partnerships.description: Are you an agency working with boutique brands? Let's talk.

response.title: Response Time
response.description: As an intentional team, we prioritize human connection. Expect a thoughtful response within 24 hours.
